raw: * Parses JSON string into an object
* @param str {String} the data to parse
* @return {Object}
* Validates a json object against the given schema signature and outputs
* diagnostic information if validation failed
* @param json {Object} The json object to check
* @param schema {Array|Object}
*    The json-schema object or an array of schema objects. If array,
*    only the first is used to validate, but the first schema can
*    refer to the others.
* @param warnOnly {Boolean} If true, do not throw a fatal error
* @return {Boolean}
*    Returns true if successful and false on failure if the
*    'warnOnly' parameter is true

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Validates a json object against the given schema signature and outputs diagnostic information if validation failed

@param.name: @param
@param.body: json {Object} The json object to check

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
schema {Array|Object}
    The json-schema object or an array of schema objects. If array,
    only the first is used to validate, but the first schema can
    refer to the others.
@param.description:
The json-schema object or an array of schema objects. If array,
    only the first is used to validate, but the first schema can
    refer to the others.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: warnOnly {Boolean} If true, do not throw a fatal error
@param.description: If true, do not throw a fatal error

@return.name: @return
@return.description:
Returns true if successful and false on failure if the
    'warnOnly' parameter is true

raw: * Loads JSON data from a file and returns it as an object; if the file does not exist, then
* null is returned
* @param filename {String} the filename to load
* @return {Object|null} the parsed contents, or null if the file does not exist

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Loads JSON data from a file and returns it as an object; if the file does not exist, then null is returned

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Object|null} the parsed contents, or null if the file does not exist
@return.description: the parsed contents, or null if the file does not exist

raw: * Saves JSON data to a file, or erases the file if data is null
* @param filename {String} filename to write to
* @param data {Object|null} the data to write. If null, remove the file

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Saves JSON data to a file, or erases the file if data is null

@param.name: @param
@param.body: data {Object|null} the data to write. If null, remove the file
@param.description: the data to write. If null, remove the file
